summary: AMY MANCUSO is a Professional Wedding Consultant and a specialist in the Weddings and Events Management Industry.  She has been coordinating elegant weddings and events in the Valley for over 19 years, and is one of the most innovative, creative professionals in the business today. Amy has been responsible for numerous local, national and international events ranging from 10, to over 10,000 participants, and she is a preferred vendor at most of the premier hotels and resorts in the Valley.  Amy has been voted Wedding Consultant of the Year 2000-2005 and into the Wedding Coordinator Hall of Fame 2006-2017 by the Wedding Chronicle’s Reader’s Poll.Specialties: Liaison, Mediator, Financial Planner, Contract Negotiations, Budget Analysis.
name: Amy Mancuso
